channel.title: St. George on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in St. George on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Story House Partners Sets Debut Feature ‘St. George’ Amid Investment in Montana Film Industry
item.description: Story House Partners, the Montana-based production branch of Story House Inc., will begin production on its first feature film in October. Titled “St. George,” the movie is a family drama
